mapper.select: select license, dept, gpsx, gpsy, online, time, type, district_code, address from t_data_sync_car where license = #{license}
mapper.insert: insert into t_data_sync_car(license, dept, gpsx, gpsy, online, type, district_code, address) values (#{license}, #{dept}, #{gpsx}, #{gpsy}, #{online}, #{type}, #{districtCode}, #{address})

insert into t_data_sync_car(license, dept, gpsx, gpsy, online, type, district_code, address) values
(#{entity.license}, #{entity.dept}, #{entity.gpsx}, #{entity.gpsy}, #{entity.online}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.districtCode}, #{entity.address})

insert into t_data_sync_car(license, dept, gpsx, gpsy, online, type, district_code, address) values
(#{entity.license},#{entity.dept}, #{entity.gpsx}, #{entity.gpsy}, #{entity.online}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.districtCode}, #{entity.address})
on duplicate key update dept = values(dept), gpsx = values(gpsx), gpsy = values(gpsy), online = values(online), time = values(time), type = values(type), district_code = values(district_code), address = values(address)
mapper.update:
update t_data_sync_car
dept = #{dept},
gpsx = #{gpsx},
gpsy = #{gpsy},
online = #{online},
time = #{time},
type = #{type},
district_code = #{districtCode},
address = #{address},
where license = #{license}
